## üßê SOME OF THE FEATURES ARE:

- Full NextJs Project
- Built with TypeScript
- Products fetched from local DataBase
- Reducer to handle Cart Actions
- React Hooks
- Modularized in React Components
- CSS in JS
- Semantic UI for React
- Improved SEO and performance with
   - Œª Server Side Rendering
   - ‚óã Static Rendering
   - & Incremental Static Regeneration
      - via NextJs built-in functions
- Analytics Metrics via NextJs 10 Analytics Feature
- Deployed on Vercel
- Continous Deployment on Vercel via GitHub
